document.full_text: with all the changes to the plot of "spider-man: turn off the dark," the broadway musical's creative team didn't fiddle with its super-power earning potential, raking in almost $810,000 for just five preview performances last week.  "wicked" regained the no. 1 spot at the broadway box office from "the lion king."
document.title: earning power of 'spider-man' undiminished
lines_and_colors: with all the changes to the plot of "spider-man: turn off the dark," the broadway musical's creative team didn't fiddle with its super-power earning potential, raking in almost $810,000 for just five preview performances last week.  "wicked" regained the no. 1 spot at the broadway box office from "the lion king."
